backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining task, user, payout, and admin structures with maps for storing state and admin-restricted query/update functions for stats and payout management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files and components involved in adding a UI control to reveal the authenticated user's principal.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of frontend files, mainly describing routes, components, and page behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application and sets metadata and favicon.
frontend/README.md: Frontend README outlining features, tech stack, and setup instructions for the Xtask web application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration defining public, authenticated, and admin routes with layout and providers.
frontend/src/components/AdminRoute.tsx: Component that checks admin status and redirects unauthorized users to an access denied page.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing the top header, bottom navigation, and themed background for authenticated pages.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication guard handling Internet Identity login, profile fetching, and onboarding logic.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar linking to dashboard, tasks, payout, and profile sections with active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Reusable glass-style card wrapper applying blur, transparency, borders, and custom classes.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that triggers Internet Identity login or logout and handles loading states and errors.
Displays and optionally reveals/copies the user's principal ID with UI controls.
frontend/src/components/TaskSubmissionFo: Form for submitting task proof text and URL, currently showing a placeholder implementation notice.
frontend/src/components/TextLogo.tsx: Simple component rendering the 'XTask' text logo.
frontend/src/components/TopHeader.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with logo, notifications, and support buttons.
frontend/src/deployInfo.ts: Loads deployment metadata such as canister IDs and site URL from environment variables.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminDashb: React Query hook to fetch admin dashboard statistics from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminPayou: Provides hooks to fetch payout requests and update their statuses, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminStatu: Hook to determine if the current caller is an admin by querying the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCallerProf: Hooks to fetch and update the current user's profile with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTasks.ts: Hooks to fetch tasks periodically and create new tasks via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages backend actor creation based on identity and triggers dependent query refreshes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider handling Internet Identity login, persistence, and exposed identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming plus global animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Displays platform details, deployment info, supported features, and limitations using GlassCard components.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Shows an access denied message with a button redirecting users to the dashboard.
Shows admin statistics with loading and error states, rendering metrics like users, earnings, tasks, and payouts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides admin panel layout with sidebar navigation and header, wrapping admin subpages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPayouts.ts: Displays payout requests with actions to approve or decline and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupport.ts: Placeholder page showing support management heading and no tickets message.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTasks.tsx: Allows admins to view tasks and create new ones with a form and validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminUsers.tsx: Placeholder page for user management with a coming soon message.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Loads the user's profile and displays earnings, task stats, and referral info with placeholders for missing backend data.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Public landing page with hero content and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Notifications.tsx: Shows a placeholder notifications page indicating no notifications yet.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: Form for creating a new user profile, handling name and optional referral code submission.
frontend/src/pages/Payout.tsx: Displays payout balance, withdrawal requirements, and placeholder payout method and history sections.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Shows user profile details, referral stats, principal reveal, and account settings actions.
frontend/src/pages/Support.tsx: Placeholder support page indicating upcoming support ticket features.
frontend/src/pages/SupportThread.tsx: Placeholder page for viewing individual support threads.
frontend/src/pages/TaskDetails.tsx: Displays detailed info for a single task, handling loading, not-found, and status-specific UI including submission and completion states.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Lists all tasks with loading skeletons and navigation to individual task details.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove hash parameters for routing and session state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, plugins, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current scope, constraints, architecture notes, and implemented features for an Internet Computerâ€“based tasks platform.
